translation.en: True!
translation.ja: トゥルー

translation.en: ♪ She's True ♪
translation.ja: あの子は

translation.en: ♪ True! ♪
translation.ja: トゥルー

translation.en: ♪ True ♪
translation.ja: トゥルー

translation.en: ♪ True! ♪
translation.ja: トゥルー

translation.en: ♪ She'll wish for me and you ♪ ♪ Hero, hero! ♪
translation.ja: みんなの願い とどける

translation.en: ♪ She's True! ♪
translation.ja: あの子は

translation.en: ♪ True and the Rainbow Kingdom! ♪
translation.ja: 虹(にじ)の国のトゥルー

translation.en: -[laughing] -Hi, Mom.
translation.ja: ママ！

translation.en: Neverending Rainbow Day has started!
translation.ja: 今日は 終わりのない虹(にじ)の日よ

translation.en: I wish it really was neverending!
translation.ja: 終わらないなら―

translation.en: Could you imagine a full-time rainbow carnival?
translation.ja: ずっと虹(にじ)のカーニバルだ！

translation.en: I think it means the rainbow is neverending, Bartleby, not the day.
translation.ja: 虹(にじ)は終わらないけど 今日は終わるよ

translation.en: Hmm... where do we start, B?
translation.ja: さて 何する？

translation.en: Easy. Breakfast!
translation.ja: まずは朝ごはん！

translation.en: [mumbling] Pancakes. Yummy-yummy.
translation.ja: パンケーキ おいしいよ

translation.en: Mmm! Blue, green, yellow, red... Yup, they're all here.
translation.ja: 青 緑 黄 赤… 完ぺきだ

translation.en: [True] Bartleby, look!
translation.ja: バートルビー

translation.en: It's happening.
translation.ja: 虹(にじ)が出るよ

translation.en: Happy Neverending Rainbow Day!
translation.ja: 終わりのない虹(にじ)の日 おめでとう！

translation.en: OK, what's next?
translation.ja: 次は何する？

translation.en: Let's try Rainbow Yeti Spaghetti.
translation.ja: スパゲティ食べよう

translation.en: How about the Rainbow Roller?
translation.ja: レインボー･コースターは？

translation.en: May I suggest a visit to Dillydally's Diorama of Dazzling Delight?
translation.ja: ディリーダリーの― 愉快(ゆかい)痛快 大興奮のジオラマは？

translation.en: -[True and Bartleby] Rainbow King! -[strums chord]
translation.ja: 虹(にじ)の王様！

translation.en: Happy Neverending Rainbow Day, your majesty.
translation.ja: 虹(にじ)の日おめでとう 王様

translation.en: And to you too, True and Bartleby.
translation.ja: おめでとう ２人とも

translation.en: So what's this dilly with the dazzly doodads...?
translation.ja: ディリーダリーの… 何だって？

translation.en: [chuckles] Dillydally's Diorama of Dazzling Delight!
translation.ja: ディリーダリーの愉快(ゆかい)痛快 大興奮のジオラマには―

translation.en: It's full of the most wonderful treasures from all across the Kingdom.
translation.ja: 素晴らしい宝物が いっぱいだ

translation.en: Like this zookalele. My good friend Dillydally gave it to me.
translation.ja: このズクレレも ディリーダリーがくれた

translation.en: You know Dillydally, the Great Explorer?
translation.ja: あの探検家と友達なの？

translation.en: Indeed I do.
translation.ja: いかにも

translation.en: She is one of my dearest friends.
translation.ja: 大の仲良しだよ

translation.en: And we both love music,
translation.ja: 音楽が好きで―

translation.en: so she always brings me back a musical souvenir from her travels.
translation.ja: 旅の おみやげに いつも楽器をくれる

translation.en: Can we meet her?
translation.ja: 私も会える？

translation.en: [laughs] Oh, goodness, no.
translation.ja: それは無理だ

translation.en: Dillydally went on an adventure to find a magical instrument at the end of the Neverending Rainbow last year.
translation.ja: １年前から虹(にじ)の向こうに 冒険に行ったきりだよ

translation.en: She's been gone a whole year?
translation.ja: １年前から？

translation.en: No wonder they call her Dillydally.
translation.ja: のんびり屋だな

translation.en: Come to think of it, that is an awfully long time, even for Dillydally.
translation.ja: たしかに ずいぶん長いこと 帰ってない

translation.en: I fear she may be... missing.
translation.ja: まさか行方不明に？

translation.en: [both] Missing!
translation.ja: 行方不明？

translation.en: We have to go find her.
translation.ja: さがさなきゃ

translation.en: Jumping juniper! It's far too dangerous, True.
translation.ja: とんでもない　危なすぎるよ

translation.en: Anyone who crosses the Neverending Rainbow must be prepared to face anything,
translation.ja: 終わりのない虹(にじ)では 何があるか分からないし―

translation.en: and come back before sunset.
translation.ja: 日暮れまでに帰らないと

translation.en: If anyone can find Dillydally and bring her back, it's me and Bartleby.
translation.ja: 彼女(かのじょ)をさがせるのは 私たちしかいない

translation.en: Very well.
translation.ja: 決して忘れるな

translation.en: But remember... at sunset the Neverending Rainbow will vanish for another year.
translation.ja: 決して忘れるな 日が暮れて虹(にじ)が消えたら 来年まで帰れないぞ

translation.en: We'll move Kittynatti fast! Right, True?
translation.ja: すばやく動くさ だよね

translation.en: First things first, we need some Wish help!
translation.ja: ウィッシュに助けてもらおう

translation.en: Oh, Cumulo!
translation.ja: モクモク！

translation.en: Thanks, Cumulo. We'll get you back to the carnival in time for the next ride.
translation.ja: ありがとう すぐに帰してあげるからね

translation.en: [True] To the Wishing Tree, please.
translation.ja: さあ 願いの木へ！

translation.en: OK, Wishes. From the top...
translation.ja: じゃあ 最初から

translation.en: [gasps] Musical Wishes!
translation.ja: 演奏してる

translation.en: True, Bartleby! You like jazz?
translation.ja: トゥルーたち ジャズは好き？

translation.en: Listen to this!
translation.ja: 聴(き)いて

translation.en: We'd love to, Zee, but we're in a real hurry.
translation.ja: 悪いけど急いでるの

translation.en: Yeah! We're going over the Neverending Rainbow.
translation.ja: そう さがしに行くんだ

translation.en: To find Dillydally.
translation.ja: ディリーダリーを

translation.en: The Great Explorer? As I remember, she never came back from her last expedition.
translation.ja: 探検家の？ 冒険(ぼうけん)に行ったきりだよね

translation.en: Right. So we're heading over the Rainbow to find her.
translation.ja: 虹(にじ)の向こうへ さがしに行くの

translation.en: That means you will have to come back by the end of the day. What if you get stuck on the other side too?
translation.ja: 日が暮れる前に帰らないと 閉じこめられちゃうよ

translation.en: We do have to hurry, Zee, but we'll be just fine, as long as we have the right Wish help.
translation.ja: 時間はないけど ウィッシュがいればできる

translation.en: Absolutely!
translation.ja: もちろん

translation.en: Let's sit... and have a think.
translation.ja: 座って 考えよう

translation.en: OK True, how can the Wishing Tree help you?
translation.ja: 願いの木に どう助けてほしい？

translation.en: Well, maybe Dillydally didn't come back
translation.ja: ディリーダリーは 閉じこめられて―

translation.en: because she's trapped or needs some kind of help...
translation.ja: ディリーダリーは 閉じこめられて― 困ってるかも

translation.en: We have to be prepared for anything.
translation.ja: 準備万端(ばんたん)で行かなきゃ

translation.en: Right, we don't know what you might find over the Rainbow.
translation.ja: 何があるか分からないね

translation.en: We might not know, but the Wishing Tree always shares the right Wishes.
translation.ja: でも どんな時も 願いの木は味方よ

translation.en: Then it's up to me to figure out how to use them.
translation.ja: 私がウィッシュを 正しく使えばね

translation.en: You always do, True.
translation.ja: 君を信じてる

translation.en: The Wishing Tree has heard you, True.
translation.ja: 願いの木にも聞こえたはずだ

translation.en: It is time to get your three Wishes.
translation.ja: ３つのウィッシュをもらおう

translation.en: I'm ready!
translation.ja: 準備は できてる

translation.en: Wishing Tree, Wishing Tree, please share your wonderful Wishes with me!
translation.ja: 願いの木よ ウィッシュを分けてください

translation.en: ♪ Wishing Tree ♪ ♪ Share with me ♪
translation.ja: 願いの木よ どうか

translation.en: ♪ Tiny Wishes, one, two, three ♪
translation.ja: ウィッシュを分けてください

translation.en: Boo-ster!
translation.ja: フンシャー

translation.en: ♪ Wishing Tree, please share with me ♪
translation.ja: お願いです どうか

translation.en: Whompit!
translation.ja: ドッスン

translation.en: ♪ Magic power for you and me ♪
translation.ja: 不思議な力を分けてください

translation.en: Korokoro!
translation.ja: コロコロ

translation.en: ♪ Magic power ♪ ♪ In the Wishing Tree ♪
translation.ja: 願いの木の不思議な力

translation.en: What an exciting ensemble of Wishes!
translation.ja: 最高の組み合わせだ

translation.en: Now let's see what the Wishopedia says about their powers.
translation.ja: ウィッシュ事典(じてん)を 見てみよう

translation.en: This is Boo-ster.
translation.ja: １つめはフンシャー

translation.en: Boo-ster!
translation.ja: フンシャー！

translation.en: This one will really blow you away.
translation.ja: 何でも ふき飛ばす

translation.en: [Zee] Boo-ster can take a big breath and blow out a super-powerful jet of air.
translation.ja: 息をはくと 強い風を起こせるんだ

translation.en: I can't wait to see you in action, Boo-ster.
translation.ja: 早く見てみたいな

translation.en: Who do we have next?
translation.ja: 次は？

translation.en: Oh yes, this is Whompit.
translation.ja: そうか ドッスンだ

translation.en: Whompit!
translation.ja: ドッスン！

translation.en: [Zee] As you know, Whompit is a stomping Wish that just loves to stomp and smash the ground.
translation.ja: 地面をふみならすのが 大好きなウィッシュだ

translation.en: Nice to see you again, Whompit.
translation.ja: また会えたね

translation.en: I don't know when we'll need your help, but I'm sure we'll have a smashing good time!
translation.ja: あなたを使うのが とっても楽しみ

translation.en: Whompit!
translation.ja: ドッスン

translation.en: And finally, we have Korokoro.
translation.ja: 最後はコロコロ

translation.en: -Korokoro. -A super rare Wish.
translation.ja: コロコロ！ とても めずらしい すべらないウィッシュだ

translation.en: [Zee] Korokoro has grippy powers.
translation.ja: とても めずらしい すべらないウィッシュだ

translation.en: It can help you walk on really slippery surfaces.
translation.ja: すべりやすい所で役に立つ

translation.en: Amazing! I'm glad to have you with us, Korokoro.
translation.ja: ステキ 心強いわ コロコロ

translation.en: Korokoro!
translation.ja: コロコロ！

translation.en: Are you three ready for an adventure on the Neverending Rainbow?
translation.ja: みんな 冒険の準備はいい？

translation.en: Zoo, zip, zap, Wishes in my pack!
translation.ja: リュックに願いを入れて！

translation.en: Thanks, Zee. We'll be back soon.
translation.ja: あとでね ズィー

translation.en: I'm counting on it.
translation.ja: 待ってる

translation.en: Thanks, Cumulo! You should get back to the Carnival. We can walk from here.
translation.ja: ありがとう ここから先は歩くわ

translation.en: Yeah, it'll be nice to stretch our legs a bit...
translation.ja: 足をのばしたかったしね

translation.en: Besides, how long could it take to cross the Neverending Rainbow?
translation.ja: 虹(にじ)の向こうなんて すぐそこだよ

translation.en: [Bartleby] Skyblubbs? We must be really high up.
translation.ja: 空アザラシだ ここ かなり高いね

translation.en: [pants] When are we going to get to the end of this neverending rainbow?
translation.ja: いつになったら着くの？

translation.en: I can't believe Dillydally came all this way by herself.
translation.ja: ディリーダリーは １人で ここに？

translation.en: I wonder what she was hoping to find.
translation.ja: 何をさがしてたのかな

translation.en: I'm hoping to find the world's biggest zazoony juice.
translation.ja: ボクは特大ジュースを さがしたい

translation.en: Mmm... super frosty with lots of ice cubes and--
translation.ja: 氷たっぷりで冷たい…

translation.en: A fork!
translation.ja: フォーク！

translation.en: Um, I think a straw might work better for zazoony juice, True.
translation.ja: ジュースにはストローでしょ

translation.en: No, it's a fork in the rainbow. Look!
translation.ja: フォークみたいな分かれ道よ

translation.en: -Huh? -Which way should we go?
translation.ja: どっち？

translation.en: I've got this, True. My tail always knows which way to go...
translation.ja: ボクに任せて しっぽが教えてくれる

translation.en: That-a-way!
translation.ja: こっちだ

translation.en: Why did your tail pick that path?
translation.ja: どうしてなの？

translation.en: Easy. That other path has stairs.
translation.ja: もう片方は階段だから

translation.en: Good call, tail. Let's go.
translation.ja: さすがね 行こう

translation.en: Well, it's nothing but smooth sailing from here on out.
translation.ja: あとは すべて うまくいくぞ

translation.en: Right, True?
translation.ja: でしょ？

translation.en: Uh-oh.
translation.ja: おっと

translation.en: What do you mean, "uh-oh"?
translation.ja: どうしたの？

translation.en: Oh, dear.
translation.ja: 大変だ

translation.en: It's like walking a tightrope.
translation.ja: つなわたりだね

translation.en: We just need to walk slow and steady.
translation.ja: ゆっくり行けばいい

translation.en: -I got you, True! -Phew! Thanks.
translation.ja: つかまえた ありがと

translation.en: This is trickier than I thought...
translation.ja: 結構 難しいね

translation.en: Ha! Not for a red-tabby Kittynatti.
translation.ja: ボクなら簡単さ

translation.en: Watch me, OK? And then just do what I do.
translation.ja: 見てて　教えてあげる

translation.en: See True? Easy peasy, rainbow squeezy!
translation.ja: ほらね　楽勝だよ

translation.en: Hang on, B!
translation.ja: 待ってて

translation.en: -I gotcha! -Phew.
translation.ja: つかまえた

translation.en: You OK, Bartleby?
translation.ja: だいじょうぶ？

translation.en: I am now. But I don't think I could have held myself up much longer.
translation.ja: 今はね でも もう限界かも

translation.en: [Bartleby] Whoa! We're high!
translation.ja: 高い！

translation.en: This could work if we do it together.
translation.ja: 一緒なら うまくいくかも

translation.en: I'll hold you up, and you hold me up, OK?
translation.ja: 手をはなさないでね いい？

translation.en: OK, you got it.
translation.ja: 分かった

translation.en: Steady...
translation.ja: しっかり

translation.en: Easy...
translation.ja: 落ち着いて

translation.en: -OK, come on. -OK.
translation.ja: いいぞ よし

translation.en: You can do it, True! Just don't look down!
translation.ja: 下を見ちゃダメだ

translation.en: 'Cause we're up so high, and you don't want to get dizzy.
translation.ja: とっても高いから目が回る

translation.en: You don't even want to think about falling 'cause it'll be like...
translation.ja: 落ちたりなんかしたら…

translation.en: [splat] Oh, I can't look!
translation.ja: もう無理

translation.en: -Done. -What?
translation.ja: 着いた えっ？

translation.en: We're here. We made it.
translation.ja: 最後まで歩けたよ

translation.en: We did it! Go Teamwork, right?
translation.ja: やった！ チームの力だね

translation.en: Thanks, B. Couldn't have done it without you.
translation.ja: あなたの おかげよ

translation.en: And look, we're almost at the top of the Rainbow.
translation.ja: 見て てっぺんが近い

translation.en: Yeah, we can handle anything this wacky Rainbow can throw at us.
translation.ja: ああ ボクたちって無敵だね

translation.en: And I spoke too soon.
translation.ja: 今のは取り消す

translation.en: [gasps] Come on, we'd better be quick if we're going to beat that storm.
translation.ja: 急ごう あらしが来ちゃう

translation.en: -[cloud grunts] -[True] Excuse me. Hi!
translation.ja: こんにちは ねえ

translation.en: We really need to get to the other side of the rainbow.
translation.ja: 虹(にじ)の向こうに行きたいの

translation.en: Could you please let us through?
translation.ja: そこを通してくれる？

translation.en: Aw, you're stuck and you're too full of rain to move?
translation.ja: 重くて動けないのね

translation.en: What do we do, True? We can't just stroll through a lightening cloud.
translation.ja: かみなり雲の中は歩けないよ

translation.en: One wrong move and...
translation.ja: １つ まちがえば…

translation.en: Not if we use some Wish power to blow it away.
translation.ja: ふき飛ばしてもらおう

translation.en: Time for my first Wish!
translation.ja: １つめのウィッシュよ

translation.en: Zip, zap, zoo, I choose you!
translation.ja: 出てきて フンシャー

translation.en: Wake up, Boo-ster, Wish come true!
translation.ja: 願いをきいてほしいの

translation.en: Hi, Boo-ster. See that big storm cloud over there?
translation.ja: あの大きな雲が見える？

translation.en: It's stuck on the rainbow and it needs our help.
translation.ja: 虹(にじ)の上から動けないの

translation.en: Let's give it a push with your super strong wind!
translation.ja: 強い風を起こして 押してあげて

translation.en: OK, Boo-ster... Blow, blow...
translation.ja: いくわよ ふいて ふいて… ふいて！

translation.en: blow!
translation.ja: ふいて ふいて… ふいて！

translation.en: -Look, it's-- -Ticklish.
translation.ja: どう？ くすぐったそう

translation.en: One more time, Boo-ster.
translation.ja: もう１回

translation.en: -You're welcome. -Thanks for not zapping us.
translation.ja: よかった 感電させる気？

translation.en: Great job, Boo-ster! Now back in the pack!
translation.ja: やったね リュックに入って

translation.en: Whoa! Be careful, B. It's a little slippery...
translation.ja: 気をつけて　すべるわ

translation.en: Uh, True? I know this is fun and all...
translation.ja: トゥルー 楽しいけど―

translation.en: [yelling] but we don't have any brakes!
translation.ja: ブレーキがない！

translation.en: Prepare for a crash landing!
translation.ja: 不時着するよ！

translation.en: We made it, B! This is the end of the Rainbow.
translation.ja: 着いた　虹(にじ)の向こうよ

translation.en: Dillydally must be somewhere on this island!
translation.ja: ディリーダリーが どこかにいるはず

translation.en: -Hello! -Dillydally! Are you here?
translation.ja: ハロー！ ディリーダリー いる？

translation.en: -[distant tapping] -[gasps]
translation.ja: ディリーダリー いる？

translation.en: Listen.
translation.ja: ねえ 聞こえた？

translation.en: Do you hear a "tink-tink-tink"?
translation.ja: ねえ 聞こえた？ “トントントン”って

translation.en: You must have cat ears, True.
translation.ja: ネコみたいに いい耳だね

translation.en: I tink-tink-tink the tink-tink-tink is coming from over there!
translation.ja: トントン鳴ってるのは― あっちだ！

translation.en: -[louder tapping] -[gasps] Bartleby, look!
translation.ja: 見て　いたわ

translation.en: It's her... Dillydally!
translation.ja: 見て　いたわ ディリーダリー！

translation.en: Huh? What? Oh my! Are you two lost?
translation.ja: まあ大変　迷子なの？

translation.en: No, we're here to find you!
translation.ja: あなたをさがしに来たの

translation.en: I'm True, and this is Bartleby.
translation.ja: トゥルーとバートルビーよ

translation.en: We're friends of the Rainbow King.
translation.ja: 虹(にじ)の王様の友達なの

translation.en: Bouncing bongos! Any friend of the Rainbow King is a friend of mine.
translation.ja: あらま うれしい！ 王様の友達は私の友達よ

translation.en: ♪ Welcome to the rainbow's end ♪ ♪ I'm tickled pink to see you, friends ♪
translation.ja: ようこそ友達 　　虹(にじ)の向こうへ

translation.en: ♪ Now listen up and lookie here ♪ ♪ With big blue eyes and purple ears ♪
translation.ja: 見て 聴(き)いて 　　青い目と紫(むらさき)の耳で

translation.en: ♪ I pucker up and give a blow... ♪
translation.ja: この音色を

translation.en: Oh, dear.
translation.ja: ダメね

translation.en: ♪ Oh dingle-dong There's something wrong ♪ ♪ I need that toot to toot along ♪
translation.ja: 困ったわ 　　最後の音を出すには

translation.en: ♪ Could use a stick un-stucker tool ♪ ♪ To help un-stuck that fuchsia jewel ♪
translation.ja: この水晶(すいしょう)を 　　取らなきゃいけない

translation.en: ♪ I pucker up and give a blow... ♪
translation.ja: ふいてみましょ

translation.en: No!
translation.ja: もう！

translation.en: ♪ Oh dingle-dong There's something wrong ♪ ♪ I need that toot to toot along ♪
translation.ja: 困ったわ 　　最後の音が出ない

translation.en: ♪ I tink tink tink and tonk tonk tonk ♪ ♪ But no tink tonk will move that rock ♪
translation.ja: トントンしても 　　水晶(すいしょう)が取れない

translation.en: ♪ It's my Dillydally kazoofa-flute And all it needs now is a... ♪
translation.ja: カズーファ･フルートは 　　　　　　　　　未完成

translation.en: -Whoo-hoo! -Bravo! That was so fun.
translation.ja: ブラボー　いい歌だ

translation.en: Rainbow King would've loved that song.
translation.ja: 王様も気に入るわ

translation.en: Oh, Rainbow King... I miss him ever so dearly.
translation.ja: ああ 虹(にじ)の王様 会いたいわ

translation.en: I haven't seen him for a whole year.
translation.ja: １年も会ってない

translation.en: I could never be away from True that long.
translation.ja: 友達とは はなれたくないね

translation.en: But you're in luck!
translation.ja: でも安心して

translation.en: Because he sent us to find you and help get you home.
translation.ja: むかえに来たわ これで帰れる

translation.en: Don't be a silly slide whistle! I'm not lost. I chose to stay here.
translation.ja: 何 言ってるの？ 帰りたくなんかない

translation.en: I was collecting these magical crystals
translation.ja: まほうの水晶(すいしょう)で フルートを作って―

translation.en: to make a kazoofa-flute as a souvenir for Rainbow King.
translation.ja: まほうの水晶(すいしょう)で フルートを作って― 王様に あげるの

translation.en: But the very last crystal just won't budge so I'm missing a note.
translation.ja: でも最後の水晶(すいしょう)が どうしても取れない

translation.en: And I am not leaving without it.
translation.ja: 取れるまで帰らないわ

translation.en: What kind of a friend would I be if I brought home a half-finished souvenir?
translation.ja: 未完成の おみやげなんて 友達に わたせない

translation.en: I do not think she's coming with us any time soon. Nuh-uh.
translation.ja: まだまだ かかりそう

translation.en: We came here to rescue Dillydally, and we're not going home without her.
translation.ja: 一緒じゃなきゃ 私たちも帰れない

translation.en: Uh, well we'd better hurry, True.
translation.ja: 急がなきゃ

translation.en: The sun's gonna set soon and you, me and Dillydally will be stuck here until next Neverending Rainbow Day.
translation.ja: 日が暮れたら みんな来年まで帰れないよ

translation.en: OK, if Dillydally won't leave without the last crystal,
translation.ja: 最後の水晶(すいしょう)が 取れればいいのよね

translation.en: maybe we can help get it out. Time for my second Wish!
translation.ja: 私たちが手伝おう ２つめのウィッシュよ

translation.en: Zip, zap, zoo, I choose you! Wake up, Whompit!
translation.ja: さあ 出てきて　ドッスン

translation.en: -Whompit! -Wish come true!
translation.ja: ドッスン 願いをきいてほしいの

translation.en: Hi, Whompit! We need your whompin', stompin' power to shake a crystal loose.
translation.ja: あなたが地面をふみならせば 水晶(すいしょう)が取れる

translation.en: Whomp, whomp!
translation.ja: ドッスン

translation.en: OK everybody, watch out!
translation.ja: みんな 気をつけて

translation.en: -[loud thud] -[gasps] Clapping castanets!
translation.ja: びっくりカスタネット！

translation.en: What was that?
translation.ja: 何？

translation.en: Whompit's going to help you get that crystal out.
translation.ja: 水晶(すいしょう)を取ってあげる

translation.en: You might wanna stay off the ground for a little bit.
translation.ja: 地面から はなれよう

translation.en: Hop on!
translation.ja: 乗って

translation.en: Alright, Whompit.
translation.ja: さあ ドッスン

translation.en: Let's stomp, stomp, stomp it!
translation.ja: ふんで ふんで… ふみならせ！

translation.en: Almost!
translation.ja: もう少し！

translation.en: Way to stomp it, Whompit!
translation.ja: やったね ドッスン

translation.en: Now back in the pack!
translation.ja: リュックに入って

translation.en: Whomp, whomp!
translation.ja: ドッスン

translation.en: Wow! It made the rainbow glow.
translation.ja: 虹(にじ)が光ったよ

translation.en: That's the power of the Rainbow Crystals!
translation.ja: これが虹(にじ)の水晶(すいしょう)の力よ

translation.en: Isn't this is the perfect souvenir for Rainbow King?
translation.ja: 虹(にじ)の王様も喜ぶわよね

translation.en: He's going to love it, Dillydally.
translation.ja: すごく気に入るよ

translation.en: And we're going to give it to him today, right?
translation.ja: 今日あげなくちゃね

translation.en: As in before the sun goes down?
translation.ja: 日が暮れちゃう前に

translation.en: [gasps] We might be too late!
translation.ja: 暮れそう！

translation.en: [Dillydally] Without the sun, there will be no rainbow to take us home!
translation.ja: 虹(にじ)が消えて帰れなくなるわ

translation.en: [gasps] Come on! Let's get moving.
translation.ja: 早く行こう

translation.en: It's way too steep.
translation.ja: 急すぎて登れない

translation.en: Not for my super Kittynati rainbow grip!
translation.ja: ボクの手なら登れるよ！

translation.en: Remind me to sharpen my claws next time.
translation.ja: ツメをとぎ忘れた

translation.en: Is there another way off this island, Dillydally?
translation.ja: ほかに道はないのかな？

translation.en: I was going to figure that part out after I got the crystal.
translation.ja: 水晶(すいしょう)に夢中で考えてなかった

translation.en: So we're stuck here until next Neverending Rainbow Day?
translation.ja: それじゃ来年まで ここを出られない？

translation.en: Look on the bright side. We finished the kazoofa-flute!
translation.ja: その代わり フルートは完成したわ

translation.en: [Bartleby] What? I didn't even bring any Fishy Poof Crackers!
translation.ja: そんな おやつも持ってきてない

translation.en: No!
translation.ja: イヤだ！

translation.en: Still so many Fishy Poof flavors to try!
translation.ja: 食べたいおやつが たくさんあるのに

translation.en: Come now, Bartleby. Get a grip on yourself.
translation.ja: バートルビー　しっかりして

translation.en: That's it!
translation.ja: そうだ！

translation.en: I have just the thing to help us get a grip.
translation.ja: しっかり つかめばいい

translation.en: It's time for my third Wish!
translation.ja: ３つめのウィッシュよ

translation.en: Zip, zap, zoo, I choose you!
translation.ja: 出てきて コロコロ

translation.en: Wake up, Korokoro! Wish come true!
translation.ja: 願いをきいてほしいの

translation.en: Hi, Korokoro!
translation.ja: コロコロ

translation.en: We need your help to climb to the top of that super steep rainbow.
translation.ja: あの虹(にじ)に登るのを 助けてくれない？

translation.en: Korokoro!
translation.ja: コロコロ

translation.en: Go, Korokoro!
translation.ja: さあ 行って！

translation.en: Come on, hop in.
translation.ja: みんな 乗って

translation.en: Now, we all need to run as fast as we can.
translation.ja: 力いっぱい走るのよ

translation.en: [True] It's working!
translation.ja: 大成功！

translation.en: Um, why is the Rainbow flickering?
translation.ja: 虹(にじ)が点滅(てんめつ)してる

translation.en: The sun is setting. We're running out of time!
translation.ja: 日が暮れる　時間がない

translation.en: Faster, everyone, faster!
translation.ja: みんな もっと速く！

translation.en: Whoo-hoo! We made it to the top of the Rainbow! No more climbing!
translation.ja: 虹(にじ)の てっぺんよ！ 登りきった

translation.en: It's all downhill from here!
translation.ja: あとは下りだ！

translation.en: [Dillydally] I can see Rainbow City.
translation.ja: 虹(にじ)の町が見える

translation.en: [Bartleby yells] The rainbow is fading!
translation.ja: 虹(にじ)が消える！

translation.en: We're not gonna make it!
translation.ja: 間に合わない

translation.en: Dillydally! Your kazoofa-flute. Can you play it to keep the rainbow glowing?
translation.ja: フルートをふけば 虹(にじ)が光るんじゃない？

translation.en: You betcha!
translation.ja: 任せて！

translation.en: [Rainbow King] I should never have let them go over the Rainbow...
translation.ja: 行かせなきゃよかった

translation.en: Oh, gruesome grey, I miss them so much.
translation.ja: 悲しいよ　いなくなるなんて

translation.en: Wait! Could it be... ?
translation.ja: 待て　あれは？

translation.en: It's too late. The rainbow's gone.
translation.ja: 虹(にじ)が消えちゃった

translation.en: [all] Oh no!
translation.ja: そんな！

translation.en: We're not going to make it, I don't think!
translation.ja: こりゃ もうダメだ！

translation.en: Cumulo!
translation.ja: モクモク！

translation.en: Terrific tambourines! You saved us.
translation.ja: なんて素晴らしい！ 助かったわ

translation.en: Of all the cushy, fluffy things I love... you're the best!
translation.ja: フワフワで気持ちいい 最高だよ

translation.en: Thanks, Cumulo! I knew I could always count on you.
translation.ja: ありがとう　頼りになるわ

translation.en: You too, Korokoro.
translation.ja: コロコロもね

translation.en: Korokoro!
translation.ja: コロコロ

translation.en: -Now back in the pack. -Whoo-hoo!
translation.ja: リュックに入って

translation.en: Grateful green!
translation.ja: ああ よかった

translation.en: Dillydally!
translation.ja: ディリーダリー

translation.en: Rainbow King!
translation.ja: 虹(にじ)の王様

translation.en: I missed you so much.
translation.ja: 会いたかった

translation.en: I was so worried about you, old friend.
translation.ja: 心配してたんだよ

translation.en: I'm sorry I was away so long.
translation.ja: ごめんなさい

translation.en: But I just couldn't come home without a special treasure...
translation.ja: どうしても あげたい おみやげがあったの

translation.en: for you.
translation.ja: これよ

translation.en: Fantastic fuchsia!
translation.ja: なんという美しさ！

translation.en: A Kazoofa-flute!
translation.ja: カズーファ･フルートだ

translation.en: But Dillydally, as wonderful as your souvenirs are,
translation.ja: おみやげもステキだが―

translation.en: there's no greater treasure than a true friend.
translation.ja: 一番の宝物は本当の友達だ

translation.en: Oh, Rainbow King, you're so right.
translation.ja: 王様 そのとおりね

translation.en: And I have two new friends who cared enough to come look for me.
translation.ja: 私をさがしにきてくれた 新しい友達もいるわ

translation.en: I'm sorry you missed your Neverending Rainbow Day.
translation.ja: 終わりのない虹(にじ)の日 終わっちゃったわね

translation.en: Well, not the whole day.
translation.ja: そんなことはない

translation.en: You didn't miss the grand finale.
translation.ja: フィナーレは これからだ

translation.en: Rocketing red and booming blue,
translation.ja: 飛び出す赤 はじける青

translation.en: a special sight for me and you!
translation.ja: 特別な景色をごらんあれ

translation.en: Here it comes! The best part of Neverending Rainbow Day.
translation.ja: 終わりのない虹(にじ)の日の クライマックスよ

translation.en: Fill the sky with wondrous light, find a friend and hug them tight!
translation.ja: 光あふれる空の下 友達を見つけてハグしよう

translation.en: [Dillydally] ♪ Welcome to the Rainbow's End ♪ ♪ I'm tickled pink to see you friend ♪
translation.ja: ようこそ友達 　　虹(にじ)の向こうへ

translation.en: ♪ Now listen up and lookie here ♪ ♪ With big blue eyes and purple ears ♪
translation.ja: 見て 聴(き)いて 　　青い目と紫(むらさき)の耳で

translation.en: ♪ I pucker up and give a blow ♪
translation.ja: この音色を

translation.en: [Dillydally] Oh.
translation.ja: ダメね
